title: Fix logo and background image not displaying

requirements.summary: Update Header component to use Vite asset import for logo image
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image displays correctly in the Header component
Image path is resolved through Vite's import system
No console errors related to missing image assets

file_operations.description: Replace the string path reference to the logo with Vite's asset import syntax. Add `import logoSrc from '/assets/kattar-sanatani-yodha-logo.jpg'` at the top of the file and update the img src attribute to use the imported logoSrc variable instead of a string path. This ensures Vite properly bundles and resolves the image asset at runtime.

requirements.summary: Update HeroSection component to use Vite asset import for background image
acceptanceCriteria: Background image displays correctly in the HeroSection
Gradient overlay remains intact over the background image
Image path is resolved through Vite's import system
No console errors related to missing image assets

file_operations.description: Replace the string path reference to the background image with Vite's asset import syntax. Add `import bgSrc from '/assets/kattar-sanatani-yodha-logo.jpg'` at the top of the file and update the background-image CSS property to use the imported bgSrc variable (e.g., via inline style `backgroundImage: `url(${bgSrc})`). Preserve the existing gradient overlay and all layout structure to maintain the current visual design.
